trustpilot_5_star.name: Allison Bradley
trustpilot_5_star.title: Five stars! Fast Results
trustpilot_5_star.review: Ok, I'm not the best at writing reviews, but this program worked — and I want to share why. I've been dealing with health issues for over a year and getting lab tests through my regular doctors. My insurance isn't great, so some of the costs came out of my pocket. Each time, the doctors said the same thing — that my lab work was "fine" and I didn't need more tests. They failed to check the important things like hormones, inflammation, cortisol, etc. Basically, they told me I was fine and that it was all in my head. Out of desperation, I tried Superpower. It included all the tests I actually needed and was cheaper than what I'd been paying with insurance just for the basics. Long story short, I finally found out I had inflammation — and now I have a plan to fix it. Healing starts with knowing what's going on. If it weren't for Superpower, I would've wasted more months and countless hours with doctors telling me I'm fine.

What impressed me most was how the program and results were explained in plain English, with a direct connection to my real goals: weight control, better sleep, more energy, improved balance, and overall health. It's clear, practical, and actionable. Instead of just numbers, I now have a roadmap for my health.

I'm very satisfied and believe this is a fantastic way to take control of our health and make meaningful improvements in our lives.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Cynethis24
trustpilot_5_star.title: Superpower-helps with insight
trustpilot_5_star.review: So, I was apprehensive at first because I don't like outrageous upsales of products and I don't care for fluff when it comes to my health. I like data and a plan of action for future improvement. But the process was straight forward. I paid, they did offer advanced tests as an option, not a requirement. Which was great. Explained how the dashboard worked and additional steps luke the health questionnaire, bloodwork process, etc. I went with advanced labs due to previous health issues. And yes, it's still cheaper than doing it yourself. I got my results back in less than a week. The optimum markers were explained and where I currently landed. Also next steps that involved one supplement I was going to take on my own. I like the AI feature to ask basic questions about your plan and misc items. But to be honest, its giving Dr. GpT, still nice. The only cons for me is that there isn't a stand alone app. I rather that then going thru a website. Also, the concierge function is nice, but 12 to 24 hrs would be nicer for replies. But I understand that its a work in progress. And I have synced my health and fitness trackers, but not sure how its reading into my bio age. I hope to see that soon too.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Nick Rezendes

trustpilot_5_star.review: As a new father, I wanted a more detailed view of my overall health — something beyond what my Dr could provide. A friend told me about Superpower. I scheduled a blood draw, didn't wait longer than 2 minutes from checking in and got my results in a few days. I loved how detailed the results were and easy for me to read/understand. Overall health score with individual markers. The action plan was awesome as well — I was able to buy some of the vitamins from their store that it recommended as well. Discounted! And when I had a question about a biomarker result, a dr got back to me via text in 24 hours. Easy, actionable, impressive.

I'm excited to put that gameplan into play and continue my path toward optimal.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Heather Mesa

trustpilot_5_star.title: So glad I did it!

I found this very helpful when I was trying to change my diet due to some of the results.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Kali
trustpilot_5_star.title: Super impressed with Superpower.com
trustpilot_5_star.review: Super impressed with Superpower.com. Getting my labs done was honestly so easy. trustpilot_5_star.name: C. Rodriguez
trustpilot_5_star.title: Affordable Labs and Actionable Insights for Better Health
trustpilot_5_star.review: Superpower.com offers an affordable and highly effective way to take charge of your health. I was able to schedule and complete comprehensive lab work through their service at a fraction of the cost I would have paid elsewhere. Since my insurance made it nearly impossible to get this type of testing approved, the accessibility of Superpower.com was invaluable. The results included an extensive panel of biomarkers, providing me with an excellent baseline of my overall health. Beyond the data, Superpower.com delivered meaningful insights and a personalized action plan to support long-term improvements. I not only plan to follow their action plan (which gave me a ton of amazing insight), but I will also continue using their service to schedule follow-up bloodwork so I can track how my health progresses over time. The dashboard looks great, the app is easy, and I even got tips on diet/supplements based on my bloodwork. Will be doing the gut test next...

trustpilot_5_star.name: Eddy Roche
trustpilot_5_star.title: Blood test was super seamless
trustpilot_5_star.review: Blood test was super seamless, easy process, and the user interface online is fantastic. Really great data and insights. They don't just give you the numbers but they explain the meaning behind them.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Elizabeth
trustpilot_5_star.title: Reducing costs and getting better answers
trustpilot_5_star.review: Like most people, I'm incredibly frustrated with our healthcare system in the U.S. and am looking for alternatives to the annual visit that is nothing but a conversation and maybe some labs - many of which are not even covered by insurance. I paid $236 for a vitamin D test as part of my annual checkup. Enter Superpower. Twice a year I get dozens of labs for the cost of about 2 vitamin D tests through the local system. The labs give me my number and ranges for bad, normal, and optimal levels just like my local system. But then comes the report explaining what each lab is and why it's important. I'm pretty healthy but thought I had problems with hormone levels (which my provider simply deduced as yes, of course, you're perimenopausal). Turns out, my hormone levels are normal. But my issues with energy, brain fog, and lack of sleep come from low levels of things iron. Superpower recommended some supplements that I'm slowly introducing now (because they also tell you how to do that). I'm looking forward to seeing how I start to feel as they settle into my system and then seeing my labs in another 4 months. And finally, I had a bunch of questions about the supplements and the AI answered them all for me based on my labs. If I had any further questions (I did not), I could have reached out to my concierge.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Andres Kupervaser Gould
trustpilot_5_star.title: Very fast onboarding
trustpilot_5_star.review: Very fast onboarding, flexible with blood draw. Overall really great.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Atela O
trustpilot_5_star.title: Helpful + Insightful!
trustpilot_5_star.review: Love it! I've been so curious to learn more about what's going on with my body beyond physicals and regular doctor visits. The dashboard has been super helpful and having actual detailed recommendations of things MY body actually needs has been great!

trustpilot_5_star.name: Jose J.
trustpilot_5_star.title: Life changing
trustpilot_5_star.review: To say the experience has been life changing is an understatement. I know my family history, and with a growing family, for me this was a no brainer. The customer service team has been exceptional and has made the process incredibly easy. The blood work was done in 4 minutes at home, the results were in within 24-36 hours, the action plan was very detailed and received in about a week and a half. If I have a question, they're always there in multiple ways. Discounted supplements, 24/7 doctor support, and everything else that they're working on for the future??? I wish I could give more stars. Amazing experience

trustpilot_5_star.name: Quinn Blake
trustpilot_5_star.title: Everything I didn't know I needed
trustpilot_5_star.review: I am generally healthy but have struggled with energy, sleep, and my hormone levels recently. After having labs done at my annual doctor appointment, I was left with little information and a whole lot of frustration. I found Superpower and was so impressed with the platform. It was easy to schedule at a nearby lab and I had results in about 7 days. Within a week, I was given a personalized Action Plan that took me through a deep dive of what was good and more importantly- what wasn't so good. It outlined some high insulin concerns, and low levels of Vitamin D, Iron, and B12. I've been able to incorporate supplements to address the deficiencies and make lifestyle adjustments to help correct the insulin concern. I am getting more restful sleep and have energy to keep up with my child (my biggest goal!). The Superpower AI feature is also incredible. I'm able to get answers that take my bloodwork into consideration and provide additional insight on my health journey. So impressed with the platform and can't wait for my 6 month draw to see how things have improved!

trustpilot_5_star.name: Tash
trustpilot_5_star.title: so easy to do and dashboard helpful
trustpilot_5_star.review: so easy to do and dashboard helpful. The blood draw was so easy to organise, and when I got my results back, the dashboard made it sooooo much easier to understand what I needed to work on for my health (normally pathology reports I find a little confusing).

trustpilot_5_star.name: Trisha De Jesus
trustpilot_5_star.title: Love it!
trustpilot_5_star.review: Superpower.com offers thoughtful and well-structured resources for anyone looking to improve focus, mindset, and daily habits. The content is practical and easy to apply, and I've found it helpful in staying more intentional with my time and energy. It's clear that the team put a lot of effort into making the platform user-friendly and impactful. Overall, a valuable tool for anyone interested in personal development.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Paul Hinrichsen
trustpilot_5_star.title: Found out major toxins issue due to Superpower
trustpilot_5_star.review: I've done the blood, toxins, and bile test and i am very happy i did. I literally failed 22/23 of the toxins measurements and it alerted me to some mold in our AC unit and pesticide problems i had no idea about. Very happy I spent the extra money and went full superpower :)

trustpilot_5_star.name: Aimee
trustpilot_5_star.title: Not a health tech person, but this changed something
trustpilot_5_star.review: I'm not super into health tech or anything, but seeing all my labs laid out in the dashboard was weirdly satisfying. It actually made me want to take better care of myself. Eat better, sleep more, just try a little harder. Also really appreciate how much thought they're putting into the user experience both in product and brand. Excited see how much more they grow!

trustpilot_5_star.name: John Smith
trustpilot_5_star.title: No more waitlist!
trustpilot_5_star.review: Superpower just removed their waitlist and I signed up last week. It's amazing! So much better than my experience with function health. Superpower's software is better. A nurse comes to your home. The branding is beautiful.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Jeff Stein
trustpilot_5_star.title: Insight and clarity for once
trustpilot_5_star.review: SuperPower gave me what no doctor, supplement, or app ever could: clarity. I've spent years managing blood sugar, energy crashes, gut issues, and brain fog -trying to piece together solutions on my own. SuperPower's bloodwork and gut testing didn't just show me the what, they helped me understand the why. Turns out I had zero levels of key gut bacteria, high inflammation, and markers of metabolic dysfunction that no one had ever flagged. I finally understood why I was feeling stuck-and what to do about it. The personalized plan didn't overwhelm me. It was clear, science-backed, and doable. I'm now seeing better glucose stability, digestion improvements, and more energy-all without guessing. If you're tired of vague advice and want real insight into your body, SuperPower is 100% worth it.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Danny
trustpilot_5_star.title: Got to the root of my symptoms
trustpilot_5_star.review: I was feeling lethargic and fatigued - nothing major, but enough to feel like something was off. I got the Superpower test since I recently moved and don't have a PCP. Super easy experience overall and found out I had elevated glucose levels. They also knew about my family history of diabetes and that was in my results. I'm doing a CGM to see if there are ways to improve my diet and avoid crashes.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Shawn
trustpilot_5_star.title: Felt better in like a week
trustpilot_5_star.review: Within a week of making the changes on my report I noticed a difference. They just told me to get some supplements and make a few diet changes. Didn't expect things to work so fast.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Abe
trustpilot_5_star.title: Love this for parents
trustpilot_5_star.review: I've got two kids, zero time, and was constantly exhausted. Superpower helped me figure out I was super low in iron and D3. Got on a new plan, started feeling way better within a couple weeks. Honestly wish I'd done it sooner.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Florian
trustpilot_5_star.title: Had my first blood test in May 2025
trustpilot_5_star.review: Had my first blood test in May 2025 and the experience was absolutely amazing. I had tested different startups before, but Superpower was the most convenient so far. The platform is amazing, and the data is pretty understandable for non-med people. The team truly listens to what users want. Honestly impressed by this service and would recommend it to anyone. :)

trustpilot_5_star.name: Kat C
trustpilot_5_star.title: No more health anxiety
trustpilot_5_star.review: Used to be always super worried about my health, bit of a health freak. But Superpower actually helped me get some peace of mind. I sleep better just knowing I have all the data about my body that I need.

trustpilot_5_star.name: James
trustpilot_5_star.title: I'd been feeling super tired for months
trustpilot_5_star.review: I'd been feeling super tired for months on end and wondering why. Turns out I was pretty severely vitamin D deficient. Found out from the test, had it explained in a report and then purchased some Vitamin D. Feel way better 1 month later!

trustpilot_5_star.name: Aditya
trustpilot_5_star.title: Unbeatable all in one platform for the price
trustpilot_5_star.review: Tried Superpower and honestly, it just makes sense. The way healthcare works today is outdated and reactive, but this actually feels like something built for the modern world. It's personal, not some generic one-size-fits-all thing. The insights actually apply to you and help you make real changes. It's also focused on prevention, not just fixing things after they go wrong, which is how it should be. The experience is smooth too. No clunky portals or confusing reports, just a clean and easy way to track and improve your health. The founders clearly get it, and it shows. If you care about taking control of your health instead of waiting until something goes wrong, Superpower is worth checking out.

trustpilot_5_star.name: Taylor
trustpilot_5_star.title: I wish I signed up 10 years ago
trustpilot_5_star.review: I wish I signed up 10 years ago! Love love love Superpower and my longevity advisor. She has been so helpful and I love that I can reach out anytime with questions and usually get a prompt reply. Highly recommend

trustpilot_5_star.review: Superpower was a great experience, awesome team

trustpilot_5_star.review: Super seamless process. Clinician's were very thoughtful. Surprising how much more motivated I am after seeing *real* numbers on my health. Very worthwhile. Will be returning in the coming years!

trustpilot_5_star.review: Fantastic product and service by entire team and doctors I worked with. Everyone is thorough and knowledgeable in their domain and provide detailed feedback on my health data and how to take action on it

trustpilot_5_star.review: Superb experience overall. Recommend highly.

superpower_website.quote: Been going through @superpower beta group and I'm blown away. This is what healthcare should look like. I also have never had a doctor breakdown lab results as well as the Superpower clinician did. Clear, actionable stuff about how to optimize biomarkers.

superpower_website.quote: I've been using @superpower for the last two months. Very impressed with the user experience and customer service from the team. The only thing I'm not impressed with is with my biological age being 3.5 years above my actual age.

superpower_website.role: Former Athlete & Founder, The Hidden Opponent
superpower_website.quote: My Superpower advisor goes, are you like, really low energy? And I was like, yes. Turns out I'm deficient in five areas that contribute to my overall energy. I felt so validated…it's not just like, oh, I burnt out. I'm feeling like I got answers and I'm hopeful.

superpower_website.quote: Wow… never realized i check all the risk factors for poor microbiome health. Super informative onboarding @superpower

superpower_website.name: Jason Yeager
superpower_website.quote: You can't change what you can't measure. For me, Superpower was a no-brainer. The transparency has really given me what I need to take action. I've never felt this excited.

superpower_website.name: Nathan Lutka
superpower_website.quote: For the last 18 months, I've used @superpower to save time. I click a button, a lab technician shows up at my house, they pull 4 viles of blood and run 50+ tests. I get results in my App within 48 hours with recommended next steps.

superpower_website.quote: I thought feeling bloated and exhausted was just part of life. Superpower revealed hidden food sensitivities and within weeks, my digestion, mood, and workouts transformed.

Today, I hit a personal best: 46 BPM resting heart rate. It means a lot, especially after losing my dad to heart disease.

superpower_website.quote: I have tried a lot of wellness products and coaching, but nothing compares to Superpower. Testing revealed insights I would've have found out otherwise regarding my hormone health and PCOS.

superpower_website.quote: As a marathoner, I was hitting a wall I couldn't explain. Superpower showed me I had low iron and B12, and then made it clear what I needed to do to become a healthier me. 1 month in and my endurance is back and I'm running stronger than ever.

superpower_website.quote: I've done MRIs, calcium scoring, regular labs — thought I knew my body inside out. But Superpower still found things I missed. After a few small changes, I feel like I unlocked a whole new level of day-to-day performance.
